subject: Re: Promotional "pop up" on website + sign ups

Thanks - Carly

Marketing Manager

Thanks looks good.

Available now for a limited time. Don't miss it.

Please let me know if there are other changes you want to implement.

It's currently set to 3-5 seconds after site load.

Can you let me know if this should only show on homepage or we will also display it on the inner pages?

Thank you.

Regards,
Cindy

Hi Carly.

Glad you like it! We were just testing it quickly and remove since we haven't got the approval yet.

We will implement the change requests.

For the time it will show, we can set it to 3-5 seconds after the site loads but let me know what you prefer. We're just fixing the view of the popup in mobile.

We'll let you know when it's completed.

Thank you.

Regards,
Cindy

Hi Cindy - I jumped online and saw the pop up 😊

It's looking good.

Is it possible to make more of the video and less of the text?

70% video / 30% text rather than 50/50?

Can you please amend the text fractionally? That was written for YouTube, please note typo on signature Johnny Gio's vodka sauce [needs an s after Gio']

Please delete the last Johnny Gio's ie Available now for a limited time. Don't miss it.

I would put the Available now for a limited time on a new line, rather than all in the same paragraph.

Thanks - Carly

(Time: 30mins)

@cindy - Please add your time on this too.

Andy review and assessment.

(Time: 60mins)

Hi Carly.

I have consulted our team regarding the font and here's what he said:

Gelica is a commercial font, so its usage typically depends on how the license was originally obtained. If we licensed the font specifically for your website project, the license may only cover web usage and not extend to desktop use or redistribution.
To use Gelica on your own devices (e.g., for marketing materials, presentations, etc.), you would generally need to purchase your own desktop or commercial license. You can usually find it on reputable font marketplaces such as:
  • https://fonts.adobe.com/fonts/gelica

Gelica is available through Adobe Fonts, which means it’s included as part of any Adobe Creative Cloud subscription. If you’re using Adobe software (like Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign, etc.) with an active subscription, you can activate Gelica directly from this link:https://fonts.adobe.com/fonts/gelica

Once activated, it will be available for use across your Adobe apps and system fonts. There’s no need to purchase it separately, and it’s licensed for both personal and commercial use within the Creative Cloud environment.

Let me know if you need further assistance on this.

Regards,
Cindy

Thanks Cindy.

We have had a couple of operational issues this morning and won't be launching the Vodka Mac n Cheese until Monday now, sorry to keep you waiting on that one.

The video is just about approved, so I will still send you the link for that this afternoon, so we're ready to set live on Monday.

In the meantime I have a question about the Gelica font used on our website. Is it possible for us to have that to use? I am not sure how it works with licensing, purchasing etc - is it something that you can send to me or do we need to purchase or download from somewhere? If yes, where from .

Thanks - Carly

Carly King

Marketing Manager



www.Johnnygiospizza.com.au

Regards,
Cindy

Hi Carly.

We can set it up for you and make it active on Friday. So just to be clear, the popup content will be the video that you are providing correct? And I want to confirm if this will only be displayed in homepage.

Thank you!

Regards,

Hi Cindy and Wolf IQ team, coming back to you on the promotional pop-up for the website.

We are launching a new product, the Vodka Mac n Cheese, on Friday and I'd like to get a promotional pop-up live on the website by the end of Friday if possible.

We shot the video for this today and I will review tomorrow. I should have the finished video on our YouTube on Friday morning, and be able to send you the link.

I'm wondering if you could please schedule time in to create the pop up on Friday afternoon please?

Thanks - Carly

Carly King

Marketing Manager



www.Johnnygiospizza.com.au

Hi Cindy – re promotional platform, we will definitely implement for our next promotion, likely in late April / early May.
CRM situation should be resolved this week so I will keep you updated.

Closing this and will follow up update end of April.
